articles.author: WILL GESCHKE The News-Review
articles.description: Hayden Morse lined up his shot.
articles.title: New indoor golf facility, Cattle Dogs, opens in Roseburg

articles.description:
ROSEBURG, Ore. - The Douglas County Dog Control Board will hold a meeting on Wednesday, January 10, 2024, at 6:00 p.m. at the Douglas County Courthouse, Room 216, located at 1036 SE Douglas Avenue, Roseburg, Oregon 97470.
The agenda meeting agenda can be located at: www.dcso.com/dogboard 
In compliance with ORS 192.610 to 192.690, we will accommodate any member of the public who wishes to watch the meeting. To view the live stream or post meeting recording, please visit: https://video.ibm.com/channel/douglascountyoregon.
Please contact the Sheriff's Office located in Room 210 of the Justice Building at the Douglas County Courthouse, 1036 SE Douglas Ave. Roseburg, OR 97470 541- 440-4449, if you need an accommodation.
articles.title: Public Meeting Notice: Dog Control Board

articles.description:
ROSEBURG, Ore. - A Level III Sex Offender has been taken into custody after writing a letter to a minor child. 
On Wednesday, January 3, 2024, Douglas County Sheriff's Deputies received a report that 44-year-old Uriah Shawn Strauss of Roseburg sent a letter to a minor child at a local high school. The letter outlined Strauss' desire to strike up a romantic relationship with a woman of at least 16-years of age.  
Strauss was located at the Roseburg Rescue Mission where he was interviewed and taken into custody for Attempted Unlawful Contact with a Child. 
The Douglas County Sheriff's Office previously notified the public that Strauss, a Level III sex offender, was sending letters that were filled with sexually explicit content, causing alarm and apprehension regarding personal safety to various women in and out of our community. 
“We renew our request that anyone who has received a similar letter from Strauss, especially anyone under the age of 18, to contact our office.”, Lt. Brad O'Dell said. "We believe that Strauss has likely attempted contact with other juveniles. It is important that we hear from anyone who Strauss has contacted or attempted to contact. 
Strauss was lodged at the Douglas County Jail where he remains in custody.
articles.title: Level III Sex Offender, Uriah Strauss, Arrested for Attempting Contact With Minor Child
